newsitem.title: USA: ENlighten to release DSM supporting Windows.
newsitem.headline: ENlighten to release DSM supporting Windows.

text.p: ENlighten Software Solutions Inc said Friday it will release in May a Version 2.2.0 of its DSM systems management suite, which adds the support of the Windows NT platform to its base of UNIX systems management capabilities. It did not disclose pricing details.

The company also said that while it was dissapointed by its first quarter loss and decrease in revenues, it is pleased with the progress it has made enhancing sales and marketing efforts and expanding its team to better address opportunities in the Open Systems and Tandem markets.

ENlighten said it has shifted its sales effort from a largely West Coast-based structure to a more field sales, regionally-oriented model. It also revised its marketing strategy to focus on smaller companies and divisions of larger enterprises.
It said it is reviewing strategies aimed at reaching enterprises with 25 to 1,000 workstations or servers, which it believes is an underserved market segment.
